verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, observe \w the|strong="H0559"\w* rest \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w prune|strong="H2168"\w* thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* shalt \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fruits thereof:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* resting \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w prune|strong="H2168"\w* thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*.

What \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* forth \w of|strong="H0776"\w* itself, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w gather|strong="H1219"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstfruits \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* vintage: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w rest|strong="H7677"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*:

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* unto \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* meat, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy manservant, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy hireling, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* strangers \w that|strong="H1961"\w* sojourn \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee:

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* grow \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* meat \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*.

Thou shalt \w also|strong="H3117"\w* \w number|strong="H5608"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7676"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* say, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w*, which together make forty-nine \w years|strong="H8141"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* thou shalt \w sound|strong="H8643"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* expiation \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* thou shalt \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fiftieth|strong="H2572"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* shalt \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* remission \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w jubilee|strong="H3104"\w*. \w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* former \w family|strong="H4940"\w*:

Because \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w jubilee|strong="H3104"\w* \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fiftieth|strong="H2572"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* grow \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* field \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* accord, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w gather|strong="H1219"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w vines|strong="H5139"\w*,

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sanctification \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w jubilee|strong="H3104"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* grow \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* presently \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w jubilee|strong="H3104"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w possessions|strong="H0272"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* thy neighbour, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* shalt \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*; grieve \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w according|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* number \w of|strong="H0376"\w* years \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* jubilee.

\w And|strong="H8141"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w shall|strong="H7069"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w to|strong="H8141"\w* thee \w according|strong="H0310"\w* \w to|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* computation \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fruits.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w more|strong="H7230"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* remain \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* jubilee, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w more|strong="H7230"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w price|strong="H4736"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w*: \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H8141"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w counted|strong="H4557"\w*, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w much|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w purchase|strong="H4736"\w* cost. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* thee \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fruits.

\w Do|strong="H0589"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* afflict \w your|strong="H3068"\w* countrymen, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* precepts, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* fulfill \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* without any fear,

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w*, \w of|strong="H0776"\w* which \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w fill|strong="H7648"\w*, fearing \w no|strong="H5414"\w* mall’s invasion.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* fruits?

\w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w will|strong="H1293"\w* \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w my|strong="H6680"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* shall \w yield|strong="H8393"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fruits \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* shall \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w old|strong="H3465"\w* fruits, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: \w till|strong="H5704"\w* new grow \w up|strong="H5704"\w*, \w you|strong="H5704"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w old|strong="H3465"\w* store.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* mine, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w sojourners|strong="H8453"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* which \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* under \w the|strong="H3605"\w* condition \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* being impoverished \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* little \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H0251"\w* \w will|strong="H1350"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0251"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w what|strong="H4465"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* price \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w value|strong="H2803"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fruits \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H8141"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* overplus \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* buyer, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* receive \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w means|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w repay|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* price, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w buyer|strong="H7069"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w what|strong="H4465"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w jubilee|strong="H3104"\w*. \w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w that|strong="H8141"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H8141"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w sold|strong="H4465"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w owner|strong="H7069"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ancient \w possessor|strong="H7069"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* selleth \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* liberty \w to|strong="H5704"\w* redeem \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* expired:

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w whole|strong="H8549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w fully|strong="H4390"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w buyer|strong="H7069"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* possess \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* posterity \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w ever|strong="H1350"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w jubilee|strong="H3104"\w*.
